'''Commissioner Clark''' is a member of the Civil Service Commission.

==History==
Commissioner Clark was meeting with the Civil Service Commission, including Dixon, when Robert Sullivan came in. He said that Dixon was corrupt and was using leverage he had to compel someone to sign off on permits despite fire hazards. He then revealed that he was the one who had stolen the drugs, which provided the leverage Dixon needed to do this.

==Career==
He is a member of the Civil Service Commission.
